AkBankPathUtil Class Reference

This class is used for returning correct path strings for retrieving the soundbank file locations. The class makes path string retrieval transparent for all platforms in all contexts. Clients of the class only needs to use the public methods to get physically correct path strings after setting flag isToUsePosixPathSeparator. By default, the flag is turned off for non-buildPipeline usecases. More...

 Returns the default path for banks.

 Returns the bank path, depending on the settings of AkInitializer, without platform-specific folder, in the proper path format.
static string GetPlatformBasePath ()
 Returns the bank path, depending on the settings of AkInitializer, in the proper path format.
static string GetPlatformSubDirectory ()
 Returns the bank subdirectory of the current platform.

Detailed Description

This class is used for returning correct path strings for retrieving the soundbank file locations. The class makes path string retrieval transparent for all platforms in all contexts. Clients of the class only needs to use the public methods to get physically correct path strings after setting flag isToUsePosixPathSeparator. By default, the flag is turned off for non-buildPipeline usecases.

Unity usecases:

  • A BuildPipeline user context uses POSIX path convention for all platforms, including Windows and Xbox360.
  • Other usecases (runtime) use platform-specific path conventions.
